languages.text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда псайкер {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горит{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} повышается на 1, а {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} — на 2. Огненный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} больше не уменьшает значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} псайкера.

traits.locale_text: When the Psyker is burning, the Psyker's psy rating is increased by +1, and the Psyker's resolve is increased by 2. Damage from fire no longer reduces the Psyker's momentum.
When the psyker is burning, the psyker's psy rating is increased by +1, and the psyker's resolve is increased by 2. Damage from fire no longer reduces the psyker's momentum.

languages.text: Когда псайкер {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горит{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} повышается на 1, а {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} — на 2. Огненный {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} больше не уменьшает значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} псайкера.
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда псайкер горит, его пси-рейтинг повышается на 1, а решимость — на 2. Огненный урон больше не уменьшает значение моментума псайкера.
Когда псайкер горит, его пси-рейтинг повышается на 1, а решимость — на 2. Огненный урон больше не уменьшает значение моментума псайкера.

languages.text: 当灵能者处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态时，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高2点。承受火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会再降低灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当灵能者处于{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态时，{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}提高1级，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高2点。承受火焰{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不会再降低灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el psíquico está {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiendo{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} aumenta en +1 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} aumenta en 2. El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} causado por fuego ya no reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del psíquico.
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el psíquico está ardiendo, su factor psíquico aumenta en +1 y su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} aumenta en 2. El daño causado por fuego ya no reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} del psíquico.

languages.text: Wenn der Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennt{/g}, wird sein {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} um +1 und die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Psionikers um +2 erhöht. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch Feuer reduziert nicht mehr die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} des Psionikers.
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Psioniker brennt, wird sein Psi-Wert um +1 und die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Psionikers um 2 erhöht. Schaden durch Feuer reduziert nicht mehr die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} des Psionikers.

languages.text: Lorsque le psyker {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}se consume{/g}, son {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} augmente de 1, et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de 2. Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} issus du feu ne réduisent plus la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} du psyker.
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le psyker se consume, son indice psy augmente de +1, et sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de 2. Les dégâts issus du feu ne réduisent plus la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} du psyker.

languages.text: この異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}している時、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+2増加する。炎による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}で異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が減少しなくなる。
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この異能者が炎上している時、超能力レートが1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が2増加する。炎によるダメージで異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}が減少しなくなる。

languages.text: Ruhsezer, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanarken{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} +1 artar ve {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılığı{/g} da +2 yükselir. Ateşten aldığı {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, artık ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumunu{/g} azaltmaz.
languages.original_text: When the psyker is {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is increased by +1, and the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} is increased by +2. {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Damage{/g} from fire no longer reduces the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
